default.title: 🎉 Welcome to the Group!
default.message:
Welcome {user}! 👋

We're excited to have you here. Please take a moment to:
📋 Read our group rules
🤝 Introduce yourself
💬 Feel free to ask questions

🤖 Type `!help` for bot commands
📜 Type `!rules` for group rules

casual.title: 👋 Hey there!
casual.message:
Hey {user}! Welcome to {group}! 🎊

Hope you enjoy your stay here. Don't be shy, jump right into the conversation! 😊

professional.title: Welcome to Our Community
professional.message:
Dear {user},

Welcome to {group}. We're pleased to have you join our community.

Please familiarize yourself with our guidelines and don't hesitate to participate in discussions.

Best regards,
The Admin Team

default.title: 👋 Goodbye!
default.message:
Goodbye {user}! 👋

Thanks for being part of {group}. You're always welcome back!

Wish you all the best! 🌟

simple.title: See you later!
simple.message: {user} has left the group. Take care! 👋

first.title: ⚠️ First Warning

second.title: ⚠️ Second Warning

final.title: 🚨 Final Warning

linkDeleted.title: 🔗 Link Removed
linkDeleted.message:
🔗 **LINK DETECTED**

⚠️ {user}, links are not allowed in this group.
🗑️ Your message has been deleted.
📝 Repeated violations will result in warnings.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Please follow group rules.

spamDetected.title: 🚫 Spam Detected
spamDetected.message:
🚫 **SPAM DETECTED**

⚠️ {user}, spam messages are not allowed.
🗑️ Your message has been deleted.
⏰ You are temporarily muted for {duration} minutes.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Please slow down your messaging.

userMuted.title: 🔇 User Muted

chatMuted.title: 🔇 Chat Muted
chatMuted.message:
🔇 **CHAT MUTED**

📵 This chat has been muted by admin.
⏰ Duration: {duration}
🔊 Use `!unmute` to restore chat

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Only admins can send messages while muted.

stickerCreated.title: 🎨 Sticker Created
stickerCreated.message:
🎨 **Sticker Created Successfully!**

✅ Your image has been converted to a sticker
📤 Sticker sent to chat
💡 **Tip:** Reply to any image with `!sticker` to convert it

mediaError.title: ❌ Media Error
mediaError.message:
❌ **Failed to Process Media**

📋 **Possible reasons:**
├─ File too large (max {maxSize})
├─ Unsupported format
├─ Corrupted file
└─ Network error

💡 Please try again with a different file.

groupCreated.title: ✅ Group Created

userAdded.title: 👤 User Added

userPromoted.title: 👑 User Promoted

botStarted.title: 🚀 Bot Started

maintenance.title: 🔧 Maintenance Mode
maintenance.message:
🔧 **Maintenance Mode**

The bot is currently under maintenance.
⏰ Expected duration: {duration}
💬 Limited functionality available

We apologize for any inconvenience.

updateAvailable.title: 🔄 Update Available

permissionDenied.title: 🚫 Permission Denied

commandNotFound.title: ❓ Command Not Found
commandNotFound.message:
❓ **Unknown Command:** `{command}`

💡 **Did you mean?**
{suggestions}

📋 Type `!menu` for main menu
📚 Type `!help` for all commands

rateLimited.title: ⏰ Rate Limited
rateLimited.message:
⏰ **Rate Limited**

🚫 You're sending commands too quickly.
⏳ Please wait {waitTime} seconds before trying again.

💡 This helps prevent spam and keeps the bot responsive.

generalError.title: ❌ Error Occurred

dailyReport.title: 📊 Daily Report

weeklyReport.title: 📊 Weekly Summary

randomFacts: 🧠 Did you know? The human brain has about 86 billion neurons!
🌍 Fun fact: There are more possible games of chess than atoms in the observable universe!
🐙 Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood!
🍯 Honey never spoils. Archaeologists have found edible honey in ancient Egyptian tombs!
🌙 A day on Venus is longer than its year!
jokes: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything! 😄
Why did the bot go to therapy? It had too many bugs! 🤖
What do you call a WhatsApp message that's always late? A delayed reaction! 📱
Why don't keyboards ever get tired? They have plenty of space! ⌨️
motivational: 💪 You're doing great! Keep up the excellent work!
🌟 Every expert was once a beginner. Keep learning!
🚀 Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts!
💎 You are stronger than you think and more capable than you imagine!
🌈 The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now!
